document_data.name: Lilianviaten Dlardrageth
document_data.mainbody: '''Lilianviaten Dlardrageth''', who usually went by '''Lilten''', was a [[gold elf]] [[cleric]], a high priest and [[chosen]] of [[Beshaba]],{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3879}} a [[Masked Lord]] of [[Waterdeep]],{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|4638}} and last prince of [[House Dlardrageth]].
document_data.Relations: He took a [[demon|fiend]] (possibly a [[fey'ri]]) as a mate and she bore him a daughter named [[Fayne]].
document_data.Description: Lilten was described as a beautiful gold elf. While in Luskan, he appeared with a rack of antlers, a sign of Beshaba's favor, although it's unknown if this was his true form or just an illusion.{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|3875}}
